question: Reduction of which of the following was the prime concern of the Uruguay round of negotiations?
option1: The debt burden of developing countries.
option2: Restrictions on the operation of a flexible exchange rate system.
option3: Restrictions on trade in agriculture and services.
option4: Restrictions on fishing rights on the high seas.
answer: Restrictions on trade in agriculture and services.
explanation: The treatment of trade in services and intellectual property had not in fact been covered by GATT prior to the Uruguay Round. The key features of the Uruguay Round Final Settlement are: An agreement on agriculture to increase market access, reduce export subsidies and tariffs and eliminate non-tariff barriers.
